channel.title: fiverr on Brian Stadnicki

item.title: Fiverr: extend Iveco activator to 2030
item.description: A customer on Fiverr sent me a copy of the Iveco easy activator v1.01. This looks to be a key generator to program Iveco trucks. The customer has requested that I add the years up to 2030 to it, as the tool only works from 2017 to 2020. Nice to see future proofing, even if I really doubt the key algorithm won’t change in that time. Running it First of all, let’s run it and see what we’re working with.
